code: @Override public Publisher<Long> createPublisher(long l) {     init().     RouteBuilder builder = new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("timer:tick?delay=500&period=50&repeatCount=" + l).setBody().simple("${random(1000)}").to("reactive-streams:prod").         }     }.     try {         builder.addRoutesToCamelContext(context).         context.start().     } catch (Exception e) {         throw new RuntimeException(e).     }     Publisher<Long> pub = CamelReactiveStreams.get(context).fromStream("prod", Long.class).     return pub. }
@Override public long maxElementsFromPublisher() {     // == Long.MAX_VALUE == unbounded     return publisherUnableToSignalOnComplete(). }

protected void init() {     tearDown().     this.context = new DefaultCamelContext().     DefaultShutdownStrategy shutdownStrategy = new DefaultShutdownStrategy().     shutdownStrategy.setShutdownNowOnTimeout(true).     shutdownStrategy.setTimeout(1).     this.context.setShutdownStrategy(shutdownStrategy). }

@AfterTest protected void tearDown() {     try {         if (this.context != null) {             this.context.stop().         }     } catch (Exception ex) {         throw new RuntimeException(ex).     } }
